creator: YATOO studio
descriptionHtml:
Personalize home screen and boost your productivity with customizable agenda & calendar widgets.

Looking for a convenient, visually appealing and easy-to-use widgets for your Google, Outlook calendar events? Wishing to have a clear schedule of planned events, significant dates, birthdays and holidays on the home screen of your smartphone or tablet?

The YATOO Calendar Widget will help you stay organized with your work and personal time, keep your plans in check, and get you closer to achieving your goals every day.

The app is a calendar widget and agenda planner – all in one. It automatically syncs events from your calendars.

No matter what gadget you use, these widgets will always display your most current schedule from both the short- and in the long-term perspectives. Get your daily, weekly, monthly planner, manage your time right there on your smartphone or tablet using widgets. Simple, no fuss!

It is a balanced combination of a minimalist, aesthetic design and optimal functionality that ensures high productivity as well as enjoyable daily use.

The modern look and available settings of allow for smooth integration of every widget into any user interface of any modern gadget.
Stylish configuration window has light and dark theme based on your system settings.

As soon as you turn on your smartphone you immediately get access to your daily list of events, your calendar and to-do lists! You get a virtual personal organizer in a set of simple and convenient widgets.

Your business and personal time-management is always on view.
Boost your efficiency while enjoying style. This is an organizer any perfectionist will appreciate.

View events, meetings, birthdays, anniversaries for days, weeks or for months ahead in scrollable list.
Add new events and open your calendar app directly via widget interface.

Free options of the YATOO Calendar Widget allow you to:
- Choose widget type (Today or Period)
- Select calendars you want to display in the widgets
- Define widget background (light or dark)
- Reduce or increase text size
- Choose widget shape, calendar week start (Sun or Mon), format for event start and end time
- Turn on color labels of your calendars

Premium options enhance customization of the widgets & made them more informative and cuter:
- Set widget transparency level
- Flexibly configure colors for agenda, calendar and dates
- Enable display of events location
- Turn on week numbers for events
- Choose event search range (from one day to three months)
- Define action is triggered by tapping events list area, calendar or current date area

Today widget shows the list of events for the current day as well as the current month calendar.
Period widget displays the list of all events for any period selected by user.

* How to connect Outlook Calendar
The easiest way to connect Outlook Calendar on your gadget is to use Gmail or Microsoft Outlook app for Android with an Outlook account configured.
Navigate to your account within Settings. Then, tap Sync Calendars.
After that you’ll be able to choose your Outlook calendars in the configuration window of the widgets.

If your priorities are convenience and functionality as well as design and aesthetics of the home screen, the YATOO Calendar Widget is the app that you will rely on for scheduling your events and managing your time!

Precision in event flow is a lifestyle.

Make your time, stay productive with agenda & calendar color widgets.
descriptionShort: Agenda & Calendar Widgets display events from your calendars on home screen

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Added ability to display events location in Today widget
- The color portfolio has been expanded: you can now choose colors from 36 options.
- Added new text size level: now you can choose text size among 3 options: smaller, medium, larger.
- Text size section moved to Basic settings.
- Widget transparency moved to Advanced settings.
- Some minor improvements.

descriptionShort: Agenda & Calendar Widgets display events from your calendars on home screen

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Added new Widget type - Calendar (available as Premium option):
- 12 months ahead scrollable calendar with clickable dates
- Just choose month, click on the desired date to display scheduled events for the selected day
- Press calendar icon to return the widget to the current date
2. Bugs fixed (in case of some languages Today Widget crashed sometimes - the problem has been solved)
3. Minor improvements

title: YATOO Calendar Widget

creator: YATOO studio
descriptionHtml:
Personalize home screen and boost your productivity with customizable Agenda & Calendar Widgets. Get daily planner, calendar with agenda in aesthetic color widgets. Events from Google Calendar and Outlook Calendar are always in sight.

Looking for a convenient, visually appealing and easy-to-use widgets for your Google, Outlook calendar events? Wishing to have a clear schedule planner, events, significant dates, birthdays and holidays on the home screen of your smartphone or tablet?

The YATOO Calendar Widget will help you stay organized with your work and personal time, keep your plans in check, and get you closer to achieving your goals every day.

The app is a set of calendar color widgets and agenda planner – all in one. It automatically syncs events from your Gmail calendar & Outlook calendar.

Your business and personal time management is always on view.


FREE OPTIONS of the YATOO Calendar Widget allow you to:
- Choose widget type (Today or Period)
- Select calendars from Gmail or Outlook accounts you want to display in the widgets
- Define widget background (light or dark)
- Reduce or increase text size
- Choose widget shape, calendar week start (Sun or Mon), format for event start and end time
- Turn on color labels of your calendars
- Add new events and open your calendar app directly via widget interface

PREMIUM OPTIONS expand widget portfolio, enhance personalization & make widgets more informative and stylish:
- Get additional interactive widget type – Calendar Widget – with 12 months ahead scrollable calendar and clickable dates. Just choose month, click on the desired date to display scheduled events for the selected day. Press calendar icon to return the widget to the current date
- Set widget transparency level
- Flexibly configure colors for agenda, calendar and dates
- Enable display of events location
- Turn on week numbers for events
- Choose event search range (from one day to three months – for Period Widget)
- Define action is triggered by tapping events list area, calendar or current date area


• TODAY WIDGET displays agenda for the current day as well as the current month calendar.
• PERIOD WIDGET displays list of all events for the period selected by user as well as the current date.
• CALENDAR WIDGET is the most interactive agenda planner. It displays calendar for the chosen month and scrollable schedule for the clicked date.

Stylish configuration window has light and dark theme based on your system settings.


No matter what gadget you use, Agenda & Calendar Widgets will always display your most current schedule from both the short- and in the long-term perspectives. Get your daily, weekly, monthly planner, manage your time right there on your smartphone or tablet using YATOO Calendar Widget. Simple, no fuss!

It is a balanced combination of a minimalist, aesthetic design and optimal functionality that ensures high productivity as well as enjoyable daily use.

The modern look and available settings of allow for smooth integration of every widget into any user interface of any modern gadget.


* How to connect Outlook Calendar
The easiest way to connect Outlook Calendar on your gadget is to use Gmail or Microsoft Outlook app for Android with an Outlook account configured.
Navigate to your account within Settings. Then, tap Sync Calendars.
After that you’ll be able to choose your Outlook calendars in the configuration window of the widgets.


If your priorities are convenience and functionality as well as design and aesthetics of the home screen, the YATOO Calendar Widget is the app that you will rely on for scheduling your events and managing your time!

As soon as you turn on your smartphone you immediately get access to your agenda, your Google & Outlook calendar data. Virtual planner in a set of convenient color widgets is always on display.

YATOO Calendar Widget is a daily planner any perfectionist will appreciate!

Make your time, stay productive with agenda & calendar color widgets.
descriptionShort: Agenda & Calendar Widgets display events from your calendars on home screen

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1). Text size settings are improved.
2). Hide end time of events, if needed.
3). Premium:
a). 2 Modes of Color Set:
- Material You - Dynamic Colors (Android 12 or higher).
- Customize colors of widget elements independently of each other more flexibly.
b). Choose time period for Today Widget: 1 day to 2 weeks.
c). Choose dates format from available templates.
d). Hide current date in Period widget, if needed.
4). Partial translation into Japanese.
5). Now you can resize widgets more flexibly.

title: YATOO Calendar Widget

creator: YATOO studio
descriptionHtml:
Personalize home screen and boost your productivity with customizable Agenda & Calendar Widgets. Get daily planner, calendar with agenda in aesthetic color widgets. Events from Google Calendar and Outlook Calendar are always in sight.

Looking for a convenient, visually appealing and easy-to-use widgets for your Google, Outlook calendar events? Wishing to have a clear schedule planner, events, significant dates, birthdays and holidays on the home screen of your smartphone or tablet?

The YATOO Calendar Widget will help you stay organized with your work and personal time, keep your plans in check, and get you closer to achieving your goals every day.

The app is a set of calendar color widgets and agenda planner – all in one. It automatically syncs events from your Gmail calendar & Outlook calendar.

Your business and personal time management is always on view.

FREE OPTIONS of the YATOO Calendar Widget allow you to:
- Choose widget type (Today or Period)
- Select calendars from Gmail or Outlook accounts you want to display in the widgets
- Define widget background (light or dark)
- Reduce or increase text size
- Choose widget shape, calendar week start (Sun or Mon), format for event start and end time
- Hide end time of events
- Turn on color labels of your calendars
- Add new events and open your calendar app directly via widget interface

PREMIUM OPTIONS expand widget portfolio, enhance personalization & make widgets more informative and stylish:
- Get additional interactive widget type – Calendar Widget – with 12 months ahead scrollable calendar and clickable dates. Just choose month, click on the desired date to display scheduled events for the selected day. Press calendar icon to return the widget to the current date
- Configure colors of the widget elements choosing from 2 Modes: Material You – Dynamic Colors (for Android 12 and higher) or User Preferences
- Set widget transparency level
- Enable display of events location
- Turn on week numbers for events
- Choose event search range
- Choose dates format from available templates
- Hide current date in Period widget, if needed
- Define action is triggered by tapping events list area, calendar or current date area

• TODAY WIDGET displays agenda for the current day or period from 1 day to 2 weeks as well as the current month calendar.
• PERIOD WIDGET displays list of all events for the period selected by user as well as the current date.
• CALENDAR WIDGET is the most interactive agenda planner. It displays calendar for the chosen month and scrollable schedule for the clicked date.

Stylish configuration window has light and dark theme based on your system settings.

No matter what gadget you use, Agenda & Calendar Widgets will always display your most current schedule from both the short- and in the long-term perspectives. Get your daily, weekly, monthly planner, manage your time right there on your smartphone or tablet using YATOO Calendar Widget. Simple, no fuss!

It is a balanced combination of a minimalist, aesthetic design and optimal functionality that ensures high productivity as well as enjoyable daily use.

The modern look and available settings of allow for smooth integration of every widget into any user interface of any modern gadget.

* How to connect Outlook Calendar
The easiest way to connect Outlook Calendar on your gadget is to use Gmail or Microsoft Outlook app for Android with an Outlook account configured.
Navigate to your account within Settings. Then, tap Sync Calendars.
After that you’ll be able to choose your Outlook calendars in the configuration window of the widgets.

As soon as you turn on your smartphone you immediately get access to your agenda, your Google & Outlook calendar data. Virtual planner in a set of convenient color widgets is always on display.

YATOO Calendar Widget is a daily planner any perfectionist will appreciate!

Make your time, stay productive with agenda & calendar color widgets.
descriptionShort: Agenda & Calendar Widgets display events from your calendars on home screen

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1) Free version:
- Now default period for Today Widget is 3 days
- Choose Accent and Additional color
- Default action by click on the event in the list - Open calendar app on event date
2) Premium version:
- Highlight today events using Accent color line
- Choose among new actions for click on events: Open event for viewing or Open calendar app on event date
- Change size of calendar color labels
- Added new period for Today Widget - 3 weeks
3) Minor improvements

title: YATOO Calendar Widget

creator: YATOO studio
descriptionHtml:
Personalize home screen and boost your productivity with customizable Agenda & Calendar Color Widgets. Get daily planner, calendar with agenda in aesthetic color widgets. Events from Google Calendar and Outlook Calendar are always in sight.

Looking for a convenient, visually appealing and easy-to-use widgets for your Google, Outlook calendar events? Wishing to have a clear schedule planner, events, significant dates, birthdays and holidays on the home screen of your smartphone or tablet?

The YATOO Calendar Widget will help you stay organized with your work and personal time, keep your plans in check, and get you closer to achieving your goals every day.

The app is a set of calendar color widgets and agenda planner – all in one. It automatically syncs events from your Gmail calendar & Outlook calendar.

Your business and personal time management is always on view.

FREE OPTIONS allow you to:
- Choose widget type (Today, Period, Simple Month, Simple Week)
- Select calendars from Gmail or Outlook accounts you want to display in the widgets
- Define widget background (light or dark)
- Change text size
- Choose widget shape, calendar week start (Sun or Mon), format for events time
- Hide end time of events
- Turn on color labels of your calendars
- Add new events and open your calendar app directly via widget interface

PREMIUM OPTIONS expand widget portfolio, enhance personalization & make widgets more informative and stylish:
- Get additional interactive widget type – Calendar Widget – with 12 months ahead scrollable calendar and clickable dates. Just choose month, click on the desired date to display scheduled events for the selected day. Press calendar icon to return the widget to the current date
- Configure colors of the widget elements choosing from 2 Modes: Material You – Dynamic Colors (for Android 12 and higher) or User Preferences
- Set widget transparency level
- Enable display of events location
- Turn on week numbers for events and calendar
- Choose event search range
- Choose dates format from available templates
- Highlight today events in several ways of your choosing
- Define actions triggered by tapping events list area, calendar or current date area
- and more.

• TODAY displays agenda for the period from 1 day to 3 weeks as well as the current month calendar.
• PERIOD displays list of all events for the period selected by user.
• CALENDAR is the most interactive agenda planner. It displays calendar for the chosen month and scrollable schedule for the clicked date.
• SIMPLE MONTH displays current month calendar.
• SIMPLE WEEK displays current week calendar.

Stylish configuration window has light and dark theme based on your system settings.

No matter what gadget you use, Agenda & Calendar Widgets will always display your most current schedule from both the short- and in the long-term perspectives. Get your daily, weekly, monthly planner, manage your time right there on your smartphone or tablet using YATOO Calendar Widget. Simple, no fuss!

It is a balanced combination of a minimalist, aesthetic design and optimal functionality that ensures high productivity as well as enjoyable daily use.

The modern look and available settings of allow for smooth integration of every widget into any user interface of any modern gadget.

* How to connect Outlook Calendar
The easiest way to connect Outlook Calendar on your gadget is to use Gmail or Microsoft Outlook app for Android with an Outlook account configured.
Navigate to your account within Settings. Then, tap Sync Calendars.
After that you’ll be able to choose your Outlook calendars in the configuration window of the widgets.

As soon as you turn on your smartphone you immediately get access to your agenda, your Google & Outlook calendar data. Virtual planner in a set of convenient color widgets is always on display.

YATOO Calendar Widget is a daily planner any perfectionist will appreciate!

Make your time, stay productive with agenda & calendar color widgets.
descriptionShort: Agenda & Calendar Color Widgets - calendar and scheduled events on home screen

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Migration to Android 13 Target SDK
Adaptive themed app icon

FOR ALL USERS
Added 2 new widget types:
- Simple Month Widget displays current month without agenda
- Simple Week Widget displays current week without agenda
- Range of text sizes is expanded
FOR PREMIUM USERS
- New Advanced options, including highlighting color for today events (Material You auto color or manual User color)
A lot of minor improvements.

After update you need to reconfigure the widgets on your home screen from scratch.

descriptionShort: Agenda & Calendar Color Widgets - calendar and scheduled events on home screen

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• Target Google Play Billing Library v6
• New app icon
• New Premium options:
- Contrast widget background option for Material You mode (widgets background color becomes equivalent to the background color of standard Google widgets)
- Added ability to display current year and week number in Today Widget
• Minor improvements

AFTER UPDATE YOU NEED TO RECONFIGURE THE WIDGETS ON YOUR HOME SCREEN FROM SCRATCH!

descriptionShort: Agenda & Calendar Color Widgets - calendar and scheduled events on home screen

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
FOR ALL THE USERS:
- Event location option has been moved to Basic Settings.
FOR PREMIUM USERS:
- Added option "Hide expired events".
We've also prepared the code for the next update, in which we plan to add the Event Indicator option for the Calendar Widget, which will highlight dates that have scheduled events.

AFTER UPDATE YOU NEED TO RECONFIGURE THE WIDGETS ON YOUR HOME SCREEN FROM SCRATCH!

title:
YATOO Calendar Widget
2.13
